TopicTitle: Current Rocket Won't Go to Launch Site

Articles.Content: I have a completed rocket in the VAB, but clicking the "Launch" button doesn't do anything. I have to press "ESC" and go to back to the space center and then to a launch pad and call the rocket in there.
Same bug here! But afterwards the game seems all very strange, not all things are working like they should, like the return to VAB, etc. Not working.

After some builds my rocket will spawn on top of the space station I'm building.


I'm currently building a Mun Space Station.
Now I want to send the last part of the station on a rocket.
The rocket spawn just fine but after a short flight I see a problem in my design. so -> Revert back to VAB.
Made some changes and hit the launch button.
Now it is stuck in the launch window.
I can hear the ESC button doing something but can't see or click any buttons.
Quick Load does work but than the rocket spawns inside my space station.
My space station ends in a big explosion and the spawned rocket is still good although I can't control it.
Now this rocket spawns in all loads of this game even the older files before this rocket was build.

Might be a problem in the struts as that is the last part I've added.
